User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the CreatorX SEO platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was last updated.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Path-based ownership enforced through the 'userId' parameter, allowing only the authenticated user to access their own data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure prioritizes authorization independence and simplifies security rules by denormalizing data and segregating data based on access requirements. User data is stored in a path-based structure for straightforward ownership management. Since there is no collaborative data present in the user request, a membership map is not required.
